definitions.definition: The action of naturalizing somebody; act of granting citizenship .
The admission or adoption of foreign words or customs into general use.
The introduction and establishment of an animal or plant into a place where it is not indigenous .

main_definition: The action of naturalizing somebody; act of granting citizenship .
secondary_definitions: The admission or adoption of foreign words or customs into general use.
The introduction and establishment of an animal or plant into a place where it is not indigenous .
